pages.text: $(li)Warpbeetles are little creatures that can be found in the Warped Forests of the Nether or in the Mushroom Field Shore of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They will not attack you, even if you are close of them.$(br)$(li)Attacking them will force them to teleport away in panic, but they will still not attack you.
They may drop Warped Fungus on death.
